rules_text:
Double strike, haste
[i]Copy Blade[/i] – Whenever another Mercenary you control attacks, create a token copy of that creature except it isn't legendary and is tapped and attacking. Exile that token at the beginning of the next end step.
[i]Killing Edge[/i] – Whenever Samuel deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card or copy a [i]Crit[/i] ability of another creature you control.
[i]Promoted Class[/i] – {R}{W}
